title: Interpretation of the shemagh in a dream

preview.html: We will examine with you the interpretation of Samagh in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Semag, turban, gutra or hata is known as covering. The samag usually takes the shape of a square and is characterized by its decoration in the form of small, overlapping squares, usually a mixture of white and red, or white and black. It is worn by bending it in the shape of a triangle and then placing it on the head and attaching it to a black frame. Sometimes it is placed on the shoulder, and what distinguishes it? It gives an elegant and formal appearance to men. The shemagh often appears in people’s dreams, so today we are showing you the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s vision of the shemagh from the encyclopedia website. Interpretation of the shemagh in a dream. Ibn Sirin mentioned in his interpretation seeing the shemagh or turban as one of the praiseworthy visions that indicate a high and famous position. For its owner among his people. Seeing a white samag and wearing it in a dream indicates the success of the dreamer in his life and the fairness of his religious and worldly circumstances, and a good sign that God will grant him success in his future affairs. Seeing a white samag in a dream shows the blessings, sustenance, and blessings that God will give to the dreamer, as does seeing a white samag. Good skin with the fulfillment of desires that the visionary had been praying to his Lord for a long time in Cairo. General. Seeing a white shemagh also portends hearing a lot of good news and the appearance of many joys and happy occasions in the coming period of his life. Also, seeing a red shemagh specifically in a dream is one of the visions that show that the person with the vision is moving at a steady pace towards achieving his ambitions and goals. From In a dream, he sees a red sign lying on his bed. This vision indicates that God has blessed him with a religiously righteous wife and created a good family. And if in your dream you see a ruler placing a sign on your head, then your dream indicates that you will assume a prestigious position or marry a pious woman with power. Good. Also, seeing a candle in general means victory over enemies, rising to high positions, an increase in power and money, and an increase in knowledge and knowledge for students of knowledge. If the dreamer feels fear of an influential and powerful person and sees in his dream that he is wearing a beautiful samajo, then this vision promises him that May God protect him from all harm and evil. Whoever gets married and sees in a dream that he is wearing a samaqah, then his wife will give birth to one of his children and he will have great importance in the future. And whoever disbelieves in God, God forbid, and sees in his dream that he is wearing a samaqah, then this is a sign of his return to the religion of truth and the declaration of Islam. And God knows best. Seeing red smagh in a dream is one of the praiseworthy dreams that indicates that the life of its owner is free of problems and tribulations, God willing. Seeing red smagh also foretells to its owner that God will give him many gifts, blessings, and presents that he did not rely on, for the good of His circumstances and the sincerity of his faith and intentions. When an unmarried woman sees a red light in her dream, this vision foretells that she will marry a good man who is linked to his religion, who has a prominent position in society, and who will satisfy her desires and be happy with him. Interpretation of a dream about a shemagh for a man: Seeing a shemagh in a dream around the feet, especially if

title: Oranges in a single woman's dream

preview.html: Oranges in a single woman's dream Sometimes a single woman dreams of strange dreams, for example, oranges in a dream for single people, and oranges are among the fruits that many people around the world love, especially in the winter, as we will talk about this topic in detail. A dream about oranges for monks from our website. Various. Seeing oranges in a dream for a single woman. Seeing oranges in an unmarried woman’s dream means that she will marry a well-off person. Seeing oranges in a dream for an unmarried woman, if they are fresh, means that she will make a big change in her life. Eating oranges in a dream for an unmarried woman is a good omen for her. Symptoms of a single woman eating oranges in a dream indicate feelings of loneliness, anxiety, and fear of her inability to bear the burdens of life. If an unmarried woman picks oranges in a dream, this indicates the problems and obstacles that stand before her. Seeing oranges in a dream for an unmarried woman, if they are yellow, means that the girl is suffering from a serious illness. Seeing oranges in a dream for unmarried women who distribute them means that God will give her many good things after seeing them. Seeing unmarried people in cages with oranges means that God will give them A lot of money from her work or from a special project she has. For an unmarried woman to see an orange in a dream and she peels it but does not eat it, this means that she has feelings for a young man. If a single woman sees that a stranger gave her an orange, this is a sign of love. Seeing a single man Or married for the sake of oranges. Imam Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a lot of oranges in a dream means comfort and that there is a good coming for the dreamer and a successful job that he may have. If a single person eats an orange in a dream, it means that God will give him a wife of beauty, character, and religion. If a single person sees that His mother gave him large amounts of oranges, this indicates that he will end the problems he is going through in his life. If the single person sees that someone he does not know gave him a box of oranges, this indicates that God will give him a lot of money. If the single person sees that a very beautiful woman gives him an orange This indicates that his life will be happy and God will bless him greatly and that the goodness he will receive is linked to the beauty of the woman he will see. His dream. If the dreamer sees that in a dream he is picking oranges, this is a good omen and happiness for him, in addition to his position at work. The color orange in a married man’s dream indicates stability, marital happiness, and the birth of righteous offspring. Seeing red oranges in a dream means that God will grant the dreamer lawful money. And it enriches him with His bounty. Seeing rotten oranges in a dream indicates bad morals and religion and can sometimes portend death. If a married man sees his wife giving him an orange, this means that their married life will be stable and that God will bless them with many good deeds. If a married man sees that his house Full of oranges, this indicates that he will enjoy stability in his family life. If a man sees that he is buying

title: Interpretation of a dream about a motorcycle in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of a motorcycle for a single, married, pregnant or divorced woman. Would you buy a driving accident and more according to Ibn Sirin? Interpretation of a dream about a motorcycle according to Ibn Sirin indicates a hasty dreamer in general who makes random decisions without thinking about them. It indicates the viewer’s lack of concern for his health and safety. Recklessness and indifference are symbols of this vision. It may indicate Dreaming of a motorcycle indicates the dreamer's constant pursuit of achieving his dreams as quickly as possible without making a plan to ensure his safety and the success of his project. This dream can be evidence of ease and success. Opening is also one of the symbols of seeing a motorcycle. It is possible that this vision heralds happy news for the dreamer, Such as engagement or engagement. A motorcycle in a dream can mean traveling to a distant country. In this dream, it indicates the character of the dreamer who gets angry. Riding a motorcycle in a dream shows haste in making a decision, and this haste will face many problems and troubles. Dream interpreters say that seeing a bike in The dream symbolizes the life of the person who has this vision and his happy future. If the bike appears to be traveling on a straight path, this indicates that the dreamer is walking on a straight path and that he is an upright person who does not do forbidden things in his life. If the road is bad and he tends to dream while riding a bike, this indicates However, the person who has this dream is a deviant personality. Riding a bicycle in a dream also indicates success in life and perseverance in it, and in many cases it indicates many problems, worries and difficulties that the dreamer faces in life. Seeing a bicycle in a dream Riding a bicycle in a single girl’s dream symbolizes Strong determination to succeed and achieve ambitions. If an unmarried girl sees a bicycle traveling on a straight road, this indicates the girl’s success in her studies or evidence of her success in life in general, while if the road is full of obstacles, this is evidence that her life will be full. Obstacles facing the realization of her dreams. If a girl sees that she bought a bicycle in a dream, this means that this year will be full of pleasant events such as engagement or marriage. Her life, and perhaps this person is her fiancé or her lover. Dream interpreters say that seeing a bicycle in a dream shows the mood of this woman. If she is straight, this indicates stability in her home with her husband. The presence of problems and obstacles that she faces in her life with her husband. A bicycle in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that she is pregnant. If she is riding a bicycle on a straight road, this indicates a safe birth and pregnancy for that mother, and vice versa. If the road is not straight and full of windings, this indicates that this woman will face many problems during childbirth. The scholar Ibn Sirin says in his interpretation of seeing a bicycle in a pregnant woman’s dream that she is pregnant with a child, but only God knows what is in the womb. I saw myself buying a bicycle in The dream states that they have overcome the difficulties they face in life and that they will be able to solve the problems they face. Also, the color of the bike in the dream has many implications.

title: Learn about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing an upset person in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing an upset person in a dream: The person who sees this dream is looking for him, especially if this person is close to the dreamer, and then wants to know the meaning of this dream and whether it has a good meaning or not, so in today’s article we will explain more than what was said in the interpretation This dream.Interpretation of seeing someone upset in a dreamWhen the dreamer sees in a dream someone upset, here the dream can have different interpretations depending on that person’s condition in reality with religion. The dream can mean that he is interested in the pleasures of this world or it may mean that he is the one who transcends and cares. In matters of his religion. This dream may mean that this person is in reality going through a bad psychological state. There are those who say that the interpretation of this dream is that the dreamer repents of sins all the time, if in reality he is one of the righteous, or it is evidence of many sins if he is so. Here the dream is a warning to him. Interpretation of seeing an upset person in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that seeing an upset person in a dream is evidence of a positive change in circumstances in the coming period, and God knows best. Here are those who say that if the dreamer sees in a dream an upset person, then the dream is a sign of He feels very sad at the moment, and God knows best. Seeing an upset person in a dream indicates the dreamer’s desire to complete some changes in his life during this period. If an upset person cries in a dream, this indicates positive changes that will occur soon. Interpretation of seeing an upset person In a dream for a single woman: Seeing one person in a dream, who is an upset person, is evidence of the nearness of happiness and the loss of her worries and sorrows. The presence of an angry person in one’s dream is evidence that she has obtained a good job and her circumstances will improve because of that. Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream is a person Dissatisfied, and there are those who say that God Almighty has blessed her with a good husband. There are those who say that the dream means the success and superiority of the dreamer and the nearness of pleasure to her because of him, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about someone you love being upset by a single woman. If a single woman dreams of one of her family members feeling upset, then the dream It indicates that you will have a lot of luck and many good things. Seeing one person in a dream, someone you love, crying a lot, is evidence that comfort is near for that person and the end of a period of sadness and anxiety, because crying is a symbol of the end of difficult things and the beginning of a life full of positivity, God willing. I know. Seeing one person in a dream, someone you love, feeling sad and upset, and she was trying to comfort him, this indicates that the dreamer is one of the kind and loving personalities who constantly occupy her mind with her attention. Those around her and she works to help them with every effort. Interpretation of seeing someone upset in a dream for a married woman: For a married woman to see someone feeling upset in a dream, this is evidence that you will hear happy news as soon as possible, and God knows best. If a married woman sees in a dream that a person feels upset, This means that her conditions will improve and that God Almighty will take care of a child soon, and God Almighty is Most High and All-Knowing. There are those who say that seeing a married woman in this dream is evidence of a rumor.

title: Interpretation No. 15 of a dream by Ibn Sirin includes the correct interpretations

preview.html: The Encyclopedia, dear reader, has presented to you the interpretation of the number 15 in a dream by Ibn Sirin, where the dreamer can see in a dream a number or number, which makes him want to find an interpretation for it and his own evidence of the great importance that the dream world holds in the reality and lives of many people. The Prophet Joseph, peace be upon him, made a covenant in his childhood, and went to his father Jacob the Prophet to tell him about his dreams. Dreams were mentioned in the Holy Qur’an in Surat Yusuf, verse five (He said: O my son, do not tell your brothers about your vision, lest they grieve against you). This is the gift that God Almighty gave him. , which is a gift given to him by God Almighty, who freed him from prison and saved him from great torment from Egypt, and his approach to interpretation is eminent scholars and commentators, such as the virtuous scholar Ibn Sirin, which we will investigate. Present in the interpretation of seeing the number 15 in a dream.Interpretation of the number 15 in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin mentioned the significance of seeing this number in a dream, which he said is not one of the praiseworthy visions, because it does not portend the appearance of goodness, but rather indicates the impossibility of achieving or achieving the goal that he seeks. Viewer. It succeeds, whether it is related to the dreamer’s personal or professional life as well as his emotional life. In another saying, seeing even numbers is better than odd numbers such as the number 15, but there are scholars who said that seeing them is a good omen that portends the death of anxiety and comfort soon, and the fortuneteller’s condition will change. For the best. Sometimes this dream symbolizes the dreamer’s emergence from difficulties and difficulties for relief and judgment. In general, the problems that can exist in the life of the dreamer, as indicated by this vision, are small problems that God commands to overcome easily and remove gently, and God knows best. Interpretation of the number 15 in a dream for a single woman: In the following points we present to you the interpretation of seeing the number 15 in a dream of a single woman or girl: In general, the numbers in a single woman’s dream indicate entering into a new life and entering into a romantic relationship with a person who is either evil or has good morals, and it depends. Its interpretation is based on the number that was seen in her dream. Seeing the number 15 in an unmarried woman’s dream is one of the dreams that requires pessimism after something, as it includes negative connotations indicating failure to achieve a desire of hers or a goal that she seeks to achieve. And if the unmarried woman is engaged or on the On the verge of engagement, the interpretation may warn that this engagement will end and will not be completed, God forbid. It symbolizes the possibility that he will fall into some disagreements or problems, but he will soon come out of them in a good way, and God knows best. Sometimes it refers to things that happened fifteen years ago A minute or fifteen days. It can also symbolize when a single woman can achieve something. Interpretation of the number 15 in a dream for a married womanIn the following paragraph we present the interpretation of the number 15 in a dream by Ibn Sirin for married people: There is a saying that seeing even numbers in a dream shows a woman’s confusion Married women are slow to achieve goals, while single numbers show the speed of achieving desires. When a married woman sees the numbers in

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about sexual intercourse for a married woman with her husband, Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about intercourse for a married woman with her husband. Many jurists look with admiration when they see a man having intercourse with his wife, but there are some cases in which sight is not considered good, including anal intercourse, rape, or coercion. More details and explanation. Interpretation of a dream about intercourse for a married woman with her husband. Interpretation of a dream about intercourse between a husband and his married wife symbolizes honoring the wife, obeying the husband’s orders, caring for him, being kind to him, getting close to him, and longing for him. This vision also expresses the satisfaction of psychological and moral desires and needs, achieving the desired goal, and achieving Climax and love, harmony of hearts and agreement. But if blood flows from her, this indicates the corruption of friendship and the existing relationship between them. If the husband’s penis is cut off during intercourse, his livelihood may be cut off and he may lose his job and job. If the husband is absent from her, this means that she will return soon and meet him and conditions will improve. Between them. Interpretation of a dream about intercourse for a married woman with her husband, Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that intercourse between a husband and his wife indicates friendship, relationship, bonds of love, status, and high status. If a woman has intercourse with her husband, she gets what she loves and desires, and if the husband practices masturbation, he spends his money on his wife without accounting for it. If the husband has intercourse with his wife while she is asleep: he is devoted to her cause, takes care of her, and satisfies her needs without neglecting. If the woman’s desire falls during intercourse, this is an incentive for her husband to do what his nature does not accept, and his intentions may be corrupted because of what she seeks. The woman’s unhappiness during intercourse is due to Instability and many disputes and problems. Interpretation of a dream about intercourse for a married woman with her husband for a pregnant woman. This vision symbolizes abundance in goodness and livelihood, reducing hardships and worries, alleviating life’s hardships, accepting positive changes, and getting rid of what disturbs her life and increases her pain. If she sees her husband taking her out and kissing her, then this It indicates his interest in her, and his great interest in the details of her life, and his caressing is evidence that the pregnancy period passed without pain or complications. If she caresses the husband’s organ, this leads to the birth of a boy, and if he abstains from intercourse with the husband, this indicates the difficulty of combining the responsibilities of the home and the problems of pregnancy. Interpretation of a dream about intercourse for a married woman with her husband in the bathroom. A husband’s intercourse with his wife in the bathroom indicates privacy and secrecy, love that includes each party, friendliness, connection and mutual benefit. If she sees her husband flirting with her in the bathroom, this indicates that she is breaking the routine, changing the established system, and achieving a qualitative leap. In the nature of her relationship with him. This vision may indicate pregnancy if she deserves it or if she is looking forward to this problem. Interpretation of a dream about a married woman having intercourse with her husband in front of people. A husband’s intercourse with his wife in front of people indicates divulging the matter and divulging the secret to the public. This vision also expresses a violation Privacy and unwanted interference by others in one's life. If the couple is in a naked position without clothes or a jacket, this indicates scandals and secrets circulating among people and a lot of gossip.

title: Interpretation of a dream about praying and crying in a dream for senior imams

preview.html: Praying and crying in a dreamDreams and visions always carry many signs and associations, which makes some people search for an interpretation of seeing begging and crying in a dream, because it is one of the visions that carries many associations. Interpretation of a dream of praying and crying in a dream. We will learn through the different website the interpretation of a dream of praying and crying in a dream. The dream that many people are searching for. Sometimes, it can make its owner feel anxious and afraid. But the interpretation of the dream may differ from one person to another, and from time to time, and also varies according to the condition of the dreamer, and the intensity of crying and the way he prays may have many different interpretations. Connotations, and it is also possible for the opinions of interpreters and scholars to differ in interpreting this dream. Interpretation of supplication and crying in a dream by Al-Nabulsi Al-Nabulsi explained that if he sees in a dream that he is crying a lot and that the crying is mixed with slapping, tearing out pockets, and screaming, then this may be an indication of a serious disaster for the dreamer. But if A person sees in a dream that he is crying loudly, but without any sound coming out of him. The interpretation of this vision is that its owner will live a quiet life full of happiness. And whoever sees in a dream that he is crying while listening to the Holy Qur’an, the interpretation of this dream is that his partner is a pure person. And close to God Almighty. And whoever sees himself in a dream crying out of fear of God, this is evidence of the dreamer’s repentance, and that he will be freed from his sins, and relief will come to him soon. Read also: What is the interpretation of a dream about Ibn Sirin’s high school? Interpretation of a dream about praying and crying in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin refers Whoever sees himself crying in a dream without making a sound, this is evidence that the dreamer will enjoy a long life. And whoever sees in his dream that he is crying with many people behind a funeral, but without making a sound, this is evidence that he will soon be able to Getting rid of his worries. And whoever sees in his dream that he is calling upon God, this vision warns him of many good things, and that he is close to God Almighty. And if the sinner sees himself in a dream begging God, then for him this is good news of guidance and a good condition in a short time. As Ibn Sirin says Whoever sees himself in a dream praying to God, this vision indicates that its owner has many desires that he wants to fulfill. And whoever sees himself in a dream begging God Almighty and there are many people around him, this vision portends the end of all the problems, disputes, and problems that he feels. He saw himself in a dream crying while he was in debt, then his vision foretells that he will pay off his debt soon. Seeing the merchant himself crying in a dream means that he will be able to compensate for his loss. And if the prisoner sees himself crying in a dream, then this vision tells him that he will soon obtain his freedom. Interpretation of a dream about prayer And crying in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees herself begging God after praying, this vision tells her that she is a good and reliable girl and will be able to overcome the problems she is going through. And whoever sees in her dream that she is begging God in the rain, this is evidence that God will answer her prayers soon. And that she will hear good news about her family

title: Interpretation of seeing a dead person sleeping in a dream by Ibn Sirin about good and evil

preview.html: If you want to know the interpretation of seeing the dead sleeping in a dream, then we will present to you through our encyclopedia article today about their dream, what it means and whether it brings good or evil. Scientists and translators have suggested a number of different interpretations of this dream, but of course they differ depending on the person, whether male or female. According to marital status, whether the person is single or married, and whether she is a woman. Single, married, pregnant or divorced, from here we will learn about the different interpretations of this dream through the following lines, so follow along with us. Interpretation of seeing a dead person sleeping in a dream Ibn Sirin says: Seeing a dead person sleeping in bed, and his condition is good, is evidence that he did good deeds before death. And that he has a feeling of contentment and comfort, which is a good omen for good. Of the deceased. If the dreamer sees a dead person near him and sleeping in bed, this indicates that he misses the presence of this person and that he feels his absence. Seeing the deceased sleeping in bed, but unable to move and bound with shackles, this is evidence of his death and he is in debt on his neck and needs someone to pay. His religion. To see yourself sleeping next to a deceased person or a group of dead people that the deceased does not know, this means traveling abroad. If the deceased calls the dreamer, this means the dreamer’s death in a way similar to the death of the deceased. Interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dreamIbn SirinIbn Sirin says that seeing a dead person in a dream It has many meanings that differ depending on the situation in which it came, and we present to you some cases through the following points. If the dreamer sees that he is shaking hands with the deceased, this is a sign that the deceased will attain the bliss of heaven and a sign that he is looking at the face of Almighty God. Seeing the deceased in a dream while embracing the dreamer , indicates a long life for the dreamer. If the dreamer sees that the deceased or the deceased bought food or furniture, this means that these things will decrease in the markets and may become scarce in existence and spread. When the dreamer sees that the deceased took him by the hand and went with him to a place that the dreamer does not know, then this It indicates that he will gain a lot of money after despair. If a person sees a dead person in a dream while he is lying down to rest from fatigue, this means his feeling of bliss and the satisfaction of God Almighty. When the dreamer sees the deceased while selling various foodstuffs, or sees a group of dead people selling foodstuffs, this means that he will gain a lot of money after despair. It means the deterioration and deterioration of these food products. When the deceased hugs the dreamer or kisses him in a dream and the dreamer knows him, whether he is a friend, relative, or neighbor, this means that he obtained something that the deceased left behind, whether knowledge or money, and in the event that the dreamer does not know the deceased, then this It means that the dreamer will obtain large sums of money from an unexpected way. If the deceased speaks with the dreamer in the dream, this means that he removes any hatred or hostility between the fortuneteller and another person or group that was between hatred or quarrel, and despite that, the affection between them will not return in a form. Great. Seeing a dead person in a dream, whether male or female, and they have returned to life, is evidence of a person’s good qualities, and that it has a great impact.

title: Interpretation of a dream about gold for a married woman according to Ibn Sirin and stealing gold in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about gold for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about gold for a married woman in a dream. The meanings of gold are many and varied, and this article will reveal to you what it means to see gold rings, chains, and earrings, and what are the most accurate meanings of wearing gold? Interpretation of a dream about gold for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about gold for a married woman includes many meanings, including promising and ominous. These interpretations are divided into the following points: First: Good interpretations of seeing gold in a married woman’s dream: If the dreamer sees many different gold pieces in a dream, and they are shiny and spread joy in her heart, then this is a sign of wealth, material sufficiency, and repayment of debts. Gold is a symbol of success. In life, if a married woman adorns herself in a dream and wears a lot of gold jewelry, this is a sign of her success in managing her home and she is also happy with her husband and the relationship. They are pure and there are no problems. The jurists said: If the dreamer wears gold in a dream, it indicates good offspring. When she dreams that her husband gives her a golden ring in a dream, she will become pregnant and give birth to a son for him. If a married woman sees that a stranger gave her shiny new gold in a dream, This is a sign that she has asked a lot from God and will get it in the end. Second: Bad interpretations of seeing gold in a dream for a married woman: When a married woman sees that her gold wedding ring has become fragile and breaks easily in a dream, this indicates that her relationship with her husband is not based on a solid foundation and will happen. Divorce soon.Seeing raw or raw gold in a married woman’s dream indicates judgments and concerns about the size of the gold bullion or nuggets she saw in the dream. Big gold is a sign of difficult fears such as diseases, imprisonment, poverty, etc. When the dreamer searches for her gold jewelry in a dream and does not find it, this means loss of money, loss of a husband, or harm that may befall one of her children. Perhaps the dream indicates failure and neglect. If a married woman dreams That her house is plated with gold, this does not bode well as some people think, but rather indicates a fire that will fill the house and destroy its members, and God knows best. Do you have a confused dream? what are you waiting for; Google is an Egyptian website for interpreting dreams. Interpretation of a dream about gold for a married woman according to Ibn Sirin. If a married woman sees gold and feels sad in a dream, then the vision warns her of poverty and drought, because the interpretation indicates loss and waste of money. But if she was happy when she saw a lot of gold in a dream, this means that God will bless her with many children. If the deceased gives a married woman a jeweler in a dream, this indicates money and giving that God gives her to be happy and satisfied in her life. When you see someone from within or outside the family giving her gold in a dream, the scene indicates that this The person stands with her because he can give her a lot of money and get her out of the debt crisis that has disturbed her life. . Perhaps the vision indicates the establishment of an emotional and loving relationship between the two parties on the ground. Interpretation of a dream

title: Interpretation of the Day of Resurrection in a dream for a single, married, pregnant or divorced girl

preview.html: Seeing the Day of Resurrection in a dream is either signs of the Day of Resurrection, or the splitting of the earth, or seeking forgiveness, or resurrection, or reckoning, or the terror of the Day of Resurrection, or the rising of the sun on the Day of Resurrection. The West and entering Paradise or Hell by Ibn Sirin and others. Interpretation of the Day of Resurrection in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The translator Ibn Sirin said in his book on the interpretation of dreams that seeing the Day of Resurrection in a dream does not differ from man to woman, as it is victory, honor and justice for the oppressed oppressor. They and those who wronged them are more cruel. He will travel soon. As for his vision of the earth on the Day of Resurrection, it becomes clear that the one who saw this dream is an honorable person. However, if a person sees during sleep the sign of the blowing of images, this indicates that there will be salvation from his relative among the righteous people from the injustice that has befallen them. As for whoever sees the sign of tearing up and opening graves in a dream and the dead coming out of the graves, this is good news that God’s victory is near and that justice He will come to this earth. His good deeds are good news for that person that he is on the path of righteousness and reward, and Ibn Sirin said that this indicates that person’s intense fear of God Almighty and his willingness to cling to his religion. Also, a person’s dream of the Day of Resurrection during his sleep indicates that this person will escape from the enemies who are waiting for him. It may indicate the emergence of strife among people soon. Loss, poverty and devastation. Whoever sees that he is walking on the straight path, this indicates that he will soon be saved from calamity. Regarding the harm of seeing him on the Day of Resurrection in a dream, Ibn Sirin said that he considers a person seeing this dream a kind of warning and warning, which means that it is possible that this person is ready to commit a crime. Transgression or sin, and he is determined to commit this sin and disobedience, and that the Day of Resurrection has not come except for him, this indicates that he will die soon, and whoever sees that he is crowded with only his wife, this indicates his injustice. From a man to his wife, and whoever sees this dream is a righteous and pious person. And whoever dreams in his sleep that the Day of Resurrection has come, and sees in that dream the horrors and signs of the Hour of Resurrection, and after all this the world returns to its previous state as if nothing had happened, this indicates injustice. It will happen in the country after justice. This indicates that this person is unjust and ignorant of his religion, and whoever sees that he is being held accountable for it, this indicates that he will lose a lot. This indicates that this country will be exposed to a major epidemic. Interpretation of the Day of Resurrection in a dream. A dream about the Day of Resurrection has many interpretations, and seeing this day is evidence of justice and support for the oppressed, and that a person will defeat his enemies easily and in a short time. Also, seeing the Resurrection in a dream indicates that the state in which he resides Man will achieve justice. Whoever sees that he will be summoned on the Day of Resurrection and stand before Almighty God, then this is a sign of salvation from the temptation to which he is exposed. And whoever sees in a dream on the Day of Resurrection a good deed, this is evidence that he will travel to a place from which he will obtain good and abundant money. But if it is a currency Bad, this is a trip that is not suitable for him, and there are many problems and problems, and it is better to stay away from it. Whoever sees the Day of Resurrection in a dream and is sure that it is the time of Resurrection, this is...
